languages.text: "Видеть я никого не вижу, Лорд-капитан, но вот слышу ее я отлично". {n}Голос Идиры чуть дрожит, псайкер не поднимает взгляда.{/n} "Она, походу, за вашим ксеносом явилась. Самолично. Так, может, и не мешать ей, а?"

"I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"
languages.original_text: "Видеть я никого не вижу, Лорд-капитан, но вот слышу ее я отлично". {n}Голос Идиры чуть дрожит, псайкер не поднимает взгляда.{/n} "Она, походу, за вашим ксеносом явилась. Самолично. Так, может, и не мешать ей, а?"

traits.locale_text: "Can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne la vois pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je l'entends sans difficulté. » {n}Idira parle d'une voix tremblotante. Elle regarde ses pieds, la tête basse.{/n} « Elle est sans doute venue s'occuper de votre xénos. Personnellement. Nous devrions peut-être lui laisser le champ libre ? Je vous en prie... »
languages.original_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne la vois pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je l'entends sans difficulté. » {n}Idira parle d'une voix tremblotante. Elle regarde ses pieds, la tête basse.{/n} « Elle est sans doute venue s'occuper de votre xénos. Personnellement. Nous devrions peut-être lui laisser le champ libre ? Je vous en prie... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「誰もいないわ、ロード・キャプテン。でも彼女の声はしっかりと聞こえるの」{n}イディラの声はわずかに震えている。彼女は足元を見すえたまま、頭を上げようとしない。{/n}「異種族を迎えに来たに違いないわ。個人的にね。彼女を邪魔すべきではないのでは？どうしましょうね？」
languages.original_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"

traits.locale_text: 「誰もいないわ、ロード・キャプテン。でも彼女の声はしっかりと聞こえるの」{n}イディラの声はわずかに震えている。彼女は足元を見すえたまま、頭を上げようとしない。{/n}「異種族を迎えに来たに違いないわ。個人的にね。彼女を邪魔すべきではないのでは？どうしましょうね？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我什么人都看不到，舰长大人，但我听得很清楚。”{n}伊迪拉的声音有些颤抖。她死死地盯着自己的脚，不愿抬头。{/n}“她肯定是来找那个异形的，是个人事务。或许我们不该妨碍她，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"

traits.locale_text: “我什么人都看不到，舰长大人，但我听得很清楚。”{n}伊迪拉的声音有些颤抖。她死死地盯着自己的脚，不愿抬头。{/n}“她肯定是来找那个异形的，是个人事务。或许我们不该妨碍她，是吧？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehe niemanden, Lord Captain, doch ich höre sie bestens." {n}Idiras Stimme zittert leicht. Sie blickt auf ihre Füße und hebt den Kopf nicht.{/n} "Ist wohl gekommen, um Euren Xenos zu holen. Persönlich. Vielleicht sollten wir ihr nicht in die Quere kommen? Bitte?"
languages.original_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe niemanden, Lord Captain, doch ich höre sie bestens." {n}Idiras Stimme zittert leicht. Sie blickt auf ihre Füße und hebt den Kopf nicht.{/n} "Ist wohl gekommen, um Euren Xenos zu holen. Persönlich. Vielleicht sollten wir ihr nicht in die Quere kommen? Bitte?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No veo a nadie, Lord Capitán, pero puedo oírla perfectamente». {n}La voz de Idira tiembla un poco al hablar. Tiene la vista fija en el suelo y no levanta la cabeza.{/n} «Habrá venido a por su xenos. En persona. Digo yo que igual es buena idea no interponernos en su camino. ¿Por favor?».
languages.original_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"

traits.locale_text: «No veo a nadie, Lord Capitán, pero puedo oírla perfectamente». {n}La voz de Idira tiembla un poco al hablar. Tiene la vista fija en el suelo y no levanta la cabeza.{/n} «Habrá venido a por su xenos. En persona. Digo yo que igual es buena idea no interponernos en su camino. ¿Por favor?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Kimseyi göremiyorum Lord Kaptan ama onu gayet iyi duyabiliyorum." {n}İdira'nın sesi hafiften titriyor. Başını kaldırmadan yere bakıyor.{/n} "Zenon için gelmiş olmalı. Bizzat. Belki de yoluna çıkmamalıyızdır? Olmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "I can't see anyone, Lord Captain, but I sure can hear her just fine." {n}Idira's voice is trembling slightly. She is looking at her feet and does not raise her head.{/n} "Must have come for your xenos. Personally. Maybe we shouldn't get in her way? Please?"

traits.locale_text: "Kimseyi göremiyorum Lord Kaptan ama onu gayet iyi duyabiliyorum." {n}İdira'nın sesi hafiften titriyor. Başını kaldırmadan yere bakıyor.{/n} "Zenon için gelmiş olmalı. Bizzat. Belki de yoluna çıkmamalıyızdır? Olur mu?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
